alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 18 at 4:31AM EST until December 18 at 9:15AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central New York, including the following counties, Broome, Chenango and Delaware. * WHEN...Until 730 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 431 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Binghamton, Walton, Delhi, Deposit, Kirkwood, Conklin, Sidney, Roxbury, Sanford, Colchester, Meredith, Bainbridge, Andes, Unadilla, Stamford, Hancock, Windsor, Afton, Margaretville and Hobart. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
